tag_list: ihound-software, safety-web, mobile-security, lost-iphone, stolen-iphone, track-lost-phone, find-missing-iphone, stolen-android, lost-android
overview:
Co-Founded iHound Software in late 2007 after discovering that Apple had no interest in helping people track down their lost iPod’s. With a simple goal in mind iHound evolved as the iPhone “revolution” took off and built the first application that was capable of tracking the location of a lost or stolen phone.

iHound Software was a bootstrapped company that never took any outside funding and was able to grow to over 100,000 paying monthly subscribers in under two years of its App being available. In late 2010, iHound was acquired by SafetyWeb, a company focused on protecting childrenâ€™s reputation, privacy and safety acquired iHound to expand their ground-breaking security platform.
